title: Do-DMT
author: Do-DMT
content: One of the biggest issues that I find is that Bitcoin seems to boring of a topic for most people...technology, money, socio-economic issues...So for the past year and a half I've been working on this piece of art that turned into a newbie-friendly, fun and colorful mini movie,that takes you through the roller coaster ride of bitcoin's 13-year history https://youtu.be/Fvt1Ma1Nep4I hope you enjoy it, and please help spread the word!

comments.author: _act_
comments.body: Nice video. But it is nothing more than bitcoin price from the 2009. When I was a newbie to bitcoin, I checked the chart myself from 2009 and which I will prefer and encourage people to do.You talked about bitcoin to reach ATH of $69000, but you did not talk about how the price has fallen already which makes it cheap to buy again because the price of bitcoin is $26000 now and you uploaded that YouTube video not up to an hour ago.

comments.author: Doan9269
comments.body: I watched the video and it's informative actually for those interested on a particular aspect with bitcoin andbyet finding it more difficult to comprehend through theoretical learning process, bitcoin have to be viewed from the general approach that would cover every aspect of its network, maybe this could be more being specific on a particular topic, targets on beginners or any other relevant aspect of this digital currency we think there's need for more information, i will suggest you go in this manners as well to either cover and focused on a particular target aspect with bitcoin, some people have found learning through video aid very important to fast track the process, you've done a very nice and presentable video clip.

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: I really like the end of your video where you said it's just a beginning and then the price keep rising without any limit. Maybe focusing about money oriented isn't really a good way to introduce BTC to newcomers, but your are intended to talk about the price, so I can't judge it. How long you create this video? considering this is your first video in this year, the previous one was a year ago.

comments.author: Peanutswar
comments.body: I watched the video and its exciting and tons of information can do enlightenment to newbies, it's good too if we teach right here how they secure the wallet they have so they don't need to get worry about the things bother them regarding with the safety of their bitcoin. I'm curious is that all of your drawing and your voice over?, if that so it was so cool, its good too if you made the animation on it, I just got a too much wave transitions with the change of panel.

comments.author: anjiitem
comments.body: Quote from: Do-DMT on August 25, 2023, 10:16:06 AMI hope you enjoy it, and please help spread the word!OP I was very amazed and really liked the video, is this really your work?. Actually I feel that the video is not only a video about a brief explanation about Bitcoin but I think the video is also an interesting and unique work of art.It's rare to see a video explaining Bitcoin briefly by combining or combining videography and the art of drawing like that in my opinion.I think this is a good and really interesting way to introduce Bitcoin to beginners because some people are more able to capture something new through videos or visuals than through reading, sometimes when reading an article about Bitcoin knowledge it will feel very boring and feel long but with visual videos like this it feels more fun and feels short.

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: first of all, Nice video, nice art and a nice choice of music, I really enjoyed it.I love the quick summary of Bitcoin prices throughout the years, and yeah, I think it is a good quick introduction for people new to Bitcoin. that being said, it is kind of unavoidable to talk about the other "boring" parts of Bitcoin and the risks it has(which newcomers really need to know).Quote from: _act_ on August 25, 2023, 10:27:40 AMYou talked about bitcoin to reach ATH of $69000, but you did not talk about how the price has fallen already which makes it cheap to buy again because the price of bitcoin is $26000 now and you uploaded that YouTube video not up to an hour ago.the OP did say after the $69k ATH that the price is crashing once again.

comments.author: elevates
comments.body: In just 4 minutes you want to introduce to the world a more than decade of Bitcoin existence. Not very professional and I felt your video lack sentiments like Why Bitcoin is importantWhat was the actual reason why the government to date fears BitcoinWhy Bitcoin is important and what makes it uniqueWhat I liked about the video is how you created hand-drawn images to graphics and I assume you might have used a video AI to create such content. The voiceover is not human I feel you might have used another AI to do it. Such videos using AI have been going viral on the Internet. I hope your video does the same as eventually it will help Bitcoin.

comments.author: Rruchi man
comments.body: Quote from: Do-DMT on August 25, 2023, 10:16:06 AMSo for the past year and a half I've been working on this piece of art that turned into a newbie-friendly, fun and colorful mini movie,that takes you through the roller coaster ride of bitcoin's 13-year history It is nice and engaging, newbies will not know when they follow the video from start to finish because of how engaging your mini movie is. I recognize the amount of creativity needed to put that clip together, and I applaud you for it. The video will be able to help newbies who are technology friendly but not to newbies who do not have a means to watch the short movie. Also newbies who will be referred to this video, will still need to be followed up.From now moving forward, I will refer people to your mini movie if they demand knowing about the history of bitcoins and how the journey has been so far.

comments.author: Hamza2424
comments.body: Haha, Hats off OP,Really Cool and entertaining stuff, a great way to cover up the storyline I would say in my Bitcointalk timeline you are  2nd or 3rd who thought of the Box and created stuff like that for the First and Second there were guys doing quite relevant stuff one was involved in the mining setup guides and the second one was creating documentaries and fun facts names I don't remember haha ...But OP really appreciates how you presented the topic in a decent way and adopted a new approach to help newbies cover up all the stuff in a few minutes of video. Keep it up.

comments.author: 2double0
comments.body: The video was good, however I felt it should have been a bit more informative (doesn't matter if it would be over 10-20 minutes) because those who are willing to know more about btc and the technology, will obviously need more information than you gave. When you keep giving goosebumps to your viewers, that's when you keep your viewer stuck at your video watching it till the end. That's an art too.

comments.author: Bd officer
comments.body: Quote from: Do-DMT on August 25, 2023, 10:16:06 AMI hope you enjoy it, and please help spread the word!Really very informative video. thank you for presenting such a beautiful video. Your video is helpful for newbies. Through this video, those who do not understand easily about Bitcoin, will know about Bitcoin very easily after watching this video. Your video also shows about bitcoin halving day. I will try to educate people about Bitcoin by showing this video of yours.

comments.author: komisariatku
comments.body: All I can say is “wow this is amazing”In the first 10 seconds I thought your video would be boring because it's only video recording images, and at first I thought the images weren't that great either. But after I watched for 20 seconds, I found it interesting, your speaking style and sound effects make it even more interesting. cool bro, you have summarized bitcoin price movements well and provided a brief background why bitcoin prices rise and fall like a roller coasterYou must have spent a lot of time creating those images and making those videos. I really enjoy the videos you make. I have subscribed to your channel, I hope you can be even more enthusiastic about creating content about bitcoin

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: I prefer to first ask newcomers what bitcoin space they're interested in. I think we should have had enough of dictating newcomers to only knowledge around bitcoin's price history, the way this ultimately leads them to have high expectations about their investment.I'm sure that most of the failure stories of someone's bitcoin journey out there are through this route of introduction, while our main bitcoin activities in/out this forum isn't just as a investor.

comments.author: Die_empty
comments.body: Quote from: Do-DMT on August 25, 2023, 10:16:06 AMI hope you enjoy it, and please help spread the word!Nice one OP. The video tried to simplify the volatility of bitcoin and some of the causes. At least newbies will understand the price history of bitcoin from inception till date. It can also make them overcome FUD because they have gotten a picture of the past. But I would have preferred the video to be more colorful with different pictures and not just a graphic display. I don't know if it was relative, the background sound was too loud. Notwithstanding it was a good try and a good teaching material for newbies. Well done for putting your creativity to work for the spread of bitcoin awareness.

comments.author: hd49728
comments.body: I love this one Not This Time (The Bitcoin Obituaries Song)Nothing can knock Bitcoin down since 2009 and Bitcoin is still here with us, survived and be strong. If OP wants to make a new video with similar format, let's use some information from two resources about Bitcoin obituaries.Bitcoin is deadBitcoin obituaries

comments.author: Victorik
comments.body: That's a really nice video.I learnt from it and I am sure many other people will also learn a thing a two from it. Bitcoin is a bit confusing and people tend to run from it because it seems to difficult to understand some terms

comments.author: Yogee
comments.body: I was a bit tired and didn't really appreciate how "shaky" the camera is and I was only waiting when you'll zoom out so I could see the whole picture. I was expecting that it will just be a drawing on a board so I was surprised when it was actually a painting on the wall. My favorite part was the the monkey photos and the background sound there hehe.Quote from: rat03gopoh on August 25, 2023, 02:01:00 PMI prefer to first ask newcomers what bitcoin space they're interested in. I think we should have had enough of dictating newcomers to only knowledge around bitcoin's price history, the way this ultimately leads them to have high expectations about their investment.I'm sure that most of the failure stories of someone's bitcoin journey out there are through this route of introduction, while our main bitcoin activities in/out this forum isn't just as a investor.It's a reality that people are more interested in investing so talking about the price volatility is a good thing. The video didn't come of as a shill to me so I don't see where you got the "high expectation".

comments.author: Razmirraz
comments.body: Very creative, you managed to summarize the 13-year history of Bitcoin's journey which is full of twists and turns and various consequences that affect the price of Bitcoin in a short video. Bitcoin has passed 13 years since Satoshi first introduced it to the public, Bitcoin's journey has not reached its halfway, there are still other surprises that could happen in the following years. Regarding the price of Bitcoin which continues to increase without limit, I am very optimistic that Bitcoin can break new records when more people still find Bitcoin boring to learn or who are not ready to accept Bitcoin in their lives. When the positive direction has approached most of the people who have never been involved in Bitcoin become interested in learning Bitcoin, then it will be the golden age of Bitcoin as more and more people are competing to get Bitcoin.

comments.author: michellee
comments.body: It is a very entertaining video with all its contents, which can be a lesson for all of us. Uh, I miss the old days when we could buy Bitcoins cheaply.You should make other videos like that so more people will watch it. And it can also make your YouTube channel more and more followers. I have also become a follower of your channel hahaha.After watching the video, we see that the fall of Bitcoin has always been influenced by third parties who want to take advantage of people's panic. And they've made it this far, and I suspect they will be like that in the future too, unless people can avoid panic.
